front.title: Usage of The RSVP Association Object

abstract.t: The RSVP ASSOCIATION object was defined in the context of GMPLS(Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching) controlled labelswitched paths (LSPs). In this context, the object is used toassociate recovery LSPs with the LSP they are protecting. Thisobject also has broader applicability as a mechanism to associateRSVP state, and this document defines how the ASSOCIATION objectcan be more generally applied. The document also reviews how theassociation is to be provided in the context of GMPLS recovery.No new new procedures or mechanisms are defined with respect toGMPLS recovery.
